backend/main.mo: Main actor for a news platform backend defining data models (Article, CitizenPost, Comment, MediaItem, UserProfile) and CRUD/role-management functions with access control and migration support.
backend/migration.mo: Defines a migration module that transforms old actor state into a new shape with a userRegistry map and userRegistryCounter, used on canister upgrade.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping planned frontend features (role system hooks, DashboardPage, user management tab) to their target files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: A JSON-formatted catalogue of short summaries for every frontend source file, describing each component or page's purpose and notable recent changes.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark mode color tokens (background, foreground, primary, sidebar, charts, etc.).
frontend/index.html: HTML shell for the React app with the page title set to 'Global Nexus' and a logo favicon, mounting the app at #root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines all TanStack Router routes (home, category, article, citizen news, multimedia, admin, dashboard, about, privacy, terms) wrapped in a LanguageProvider and Layout.
frontend/src/components/ArticleCard.tsx: Reusable article card component supporting default and compact variants, displaying image, category badge, title (with Hindi support), author, and formatted date with a blue breaking-news badge.
frontend/src/components/ArticleManagemen: Admin component that displays a table of all articles with title, category, author, date, and breaking/featured flags, along with a form to create new articles.
frontend/src/components/BreakingNewsTick: Horizontally scrolling ticker bar that displays breaking news headlines (with Hindi support) fetched from the backend.
frontend/src/components/CategoryBadge.ts: Small colored badge component that renders a localized, styled label for a given article category.
Displays up to four article cards for a given category with a header, loading skeleton, empty state, and a 'view all' link.
Card component linking to a citizen post detail page, showing image, category badge, optional status badge, title, author, and date.
frontend/src/components/CitizenPostModer: Admin moderation panel listing all citizen posts with their status, allowing admins to approve or reject pending posts.
Displays comments for an article or citizen post and provides an authenticated form for logged-in users to submit new comments.
frontend/src/components/CreateArticleFor: A form component for creating news articles with fields for title, body, author, category, and flags like breaking/featured, supporting both English and Hindi inputs with validation and success/error feedback.
frontend/src/components/FeaturedHero.tsx: Displays a large hero banner for a featured article with a background image, gradient overlay, title, excerpt, and metadata; handles loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/LanguageToggle.t: A small toggle button that switches the app language between English and Hindi using the LanguageContext.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main app layout component providing a sticky header with navigation links, category nav, login button, language toggle, breaking news ticker, and a profile setup modal trigger.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Handles Internet Identity authentication, rendering a login button for unauthenticated users and a logout button with the user's profile name for authenticated users.
frontend/src/components/MediaCard.tsx: Displays a media item card (video, podcast, or reel) with a thumbnail, type badge, hover play overlay, and an action button that either opens an embed or triggers a play callback.
frontend/src/components/PrincipalIdDispl: Shows the authenticated user's truncated Internet Identity principal ID with a copy-to-clipboard button.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal dialog that prompts newly authenticated users to enter a display name to create their profile, blocking dismissal until submitted.
Renders up to three related articles from the same category as the current article, excluding the current one, using the compact ArticleCard variant.
frontend/src/components/Sidebar.tsx: Renders a sidebar with a 'Most Read' articles list and a 'Citizen Spotlight' section showing approved citizen posts, with links to full articles and the citizen news page.
frontend/src/components/SubmitStoryModal: A modal dialog form that allows authenticated users to submit a citizen story with title, body, category, and optional image URL, showing a success state after submission.
frontend/src/components/UserManagement.t: Admin UI component for viewing the user role registry, assigning roles to users by Principal ID, and revoking existing roles, with copy-to-clipboard support for Principal IDs.
frontend/src/components/VideoPlayerModal: A modal dialog that embeds a responsive 16:9 iframe video player for a given embed URL and title.
frontend/src/constants/translations.ts: Defines English and Hindi translation string objects covering all UI sections including navigation, articles, citizen reports, admin, and common labels.
frontend/src/contexts/LanguageContext.ts: Provides a React context for managing the active UI language ('en' or 'hi'), persisting the selection to sessionStorage and exposing toggle/set functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using the current Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication on the ICP platform, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient creation with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data including articles, citizen posts, comments, media, and user profiles via the ICP actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useTranslation.ts: A simple hook that returns the translation object and current language by combining the LanguageContext with the translations constants.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Google Fonts, sets up Tailwind directives, and defines CSS custom properties for the Global Nexus color palette in both light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrapping the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Static About page displaying a founder profile card with photo, bio, and credentials for Pawnesh Kumar Singh, the founder of Global Nexus.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard page that guards access by checking authentication and admin role, then renders tabbed panels for article management and citizen post moderation.
frontend/src/pages/ArticleDetailPage.tsx: Article detail page that fetches articles by ID, displays the full article with title, hero image, body, author metadata, and renders related articles and a comments section.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryPage.tsx: Displays a paginated grid of articles for a given category, mapping URL params to ArticleCategory enum values and showing a header with category badge and article count.
frontend/src/pages/CitizenNewsPage.tsx: Shows approved citizen-submitted posts with category filters and a header banner; authenticated users can open a SubmitStoryModal to submit new stories.
frontend/src/pages/CitizenPostDetailPage: Renders the full detail view of a single citizen post including image, body, status badge, and a comments section, with a back link to the citizen news listing.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Protected dashboard page that shows different views based on user role: admins get tabbed management panels (articles, moderation, users), while unassigned users see a prompt to contact an admin.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page that renders a featured hero article, a sidebar, and per-category article sections by fetching featured and category-specific articles.
frontend/src/pages/MultimediaPage.tsx: Multimedia page with tabbed sections for videos, podcasts, and reels fetched from the backend, supporting video playback via a modal.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Renders the Privacy Policy page for Global Nexus with a hero banner and numbered sections covering data collection, user rights, security, and contact information.
frontend/src/pages/TermsOfServicePage.ts: Renders the Terms of Service page for Global Nexus with a hero banner and numbered sections covering user responsibilities, content submission, legal compliance, and termination policies.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utility functions for reading URL query parameters (including hash-based routing), persisting them to sessionStorage, and cleaning sensitive params from the URL bar.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining the Global Nexus design system: blue/black brand colors, Playfair Display and Noto Sans font families, custom shadows, border radii, and ticker/accordion keyframe animations.
project_state.json: Tracks the overall project state (version 15) for the Global Nexus multilingual news platform, documenting existing features, architectural notes, known issues, and the role-based auth system being implemented.
